column4: Hi! I installed ubuntu 10.04 LTS 64 desktop on my Dell Latitude e6510 inside windows It went dead what exactly is the problem ? how to fix ?
Dr_willis : yes! I did burn it on to a CD and installed inside windows 7
it just died?
yes! no response from any keys
just through ubuntu right
lol
any recovery from that ? I tried to run without installing the same thing happened
I dunno never heard that before, you could google it and see what comes up
I doubt youll get that much material on it tho, kinda strange
: why it would not run from the cd alone  without installing ?
wubi is a .exe file, not a live cd? afaik
: is it bcos of the nvidia chip onboard ?
keyboard issues? highly doubtful
or do you mean the screen went dead,
: bcos the display goes blank
ahh,
: and latter that machine
: any quickfix solution ?
I dunno exactly what but someone here could tell you how to recompile xorg.conf im sure (and boot in terminal perhaps)
thats the only thing I can think of, you gotta edit your xorg.conf , maybe reset drivers to 'generic' or whatever name they go by
I dont know how to do that though sorry
: can you suggest better version for my Dell Latitude e6510
: u there ?
im not that good with linux sorry
